section.title: Options and fuctions in the ownCloud main user interface
section.para: In the main user interface you can find the following areas for navigating ownCloud:

listitem.para: Files options menu: You can find it in the upper left menu. Click the arrow to see the options availables.
-Favourites
-Shared with you
-Shared with others
-Shared by links
-Tags
Application Settings: In the bottom left menu you can access to the application settings and to the list of deleted files.
Folders and files: The main central area displays all the items and user features.

Navigation menu: Located at top margin it includes the following options.
-new button: enables you to create new files, new folders, or upload files
Gallery button: four squares icon that enables you to display your images gallery.
Search field: Located at top right margin, allows you to search files quickly.
User settings: Open the dropdown menu for display your personal settings. This menu contains the following settings and features:
-Personal: you can set your personal info, sync clients, user and application passwords and monitoring your recent activity and sessions.
-Users: select this option for creating new groups and configuring their credentials and storage quota amongst other actions.
-Help
-Admin: here you can view your security and setup warnings.
-Log Out: click here to log out the application.

caption.para: Fields and functions in ownCloud user interface

section.para: The following sections explain how to do the main basic operations in ownCloud such as files and folders creation, uploadig/ downloading files or change userÂ´s passwords.

section.title: How to create new folders?
section.para: You can create folders and new text files both directly from the main user interface and within an existing folder. You simply must use in both cases the New button.
Creating a folder in the root directory: click the new button and select the folder option.

caption.para: Creating a new folder in the main user interface

section.para: Creating a new folder inside an existing folder: click on the folder you want to create the new folder or text file and once you have accessed, click click the new button and select the folder option.

caption.para: Creating a new folder inside an existing folder

section.title: Uploading and downloading folders and files
section.para:
Uploading files
This option is not available for folder upload. You can compress your folder and upload it as a compressed file into your application. is very simple in ownCloud. Simply click on New button both in the main user interface and inside an existing folder and select the Upload option. Select the file from your computer and click Open. It will be automatically added to your application.
For downloading files you have two options:

listitem.para: Select the item you want to download and then click on the vertical bar with three little circles that is located on the right of each file/ foldername. It opens a dropdown menu: select the Download option.
Make a single or a multiple selection clicking the checkbox and select the Download option that is located on top of the content list.

note.title: Note
note.para: If you are downloading a folder this will be downloaded as a compressed file.

section.title: How to share files and folders
section.para: You can share files with other groups or by getting the local link of each item.
Clicking on Share icon (on the right of file or foldername) you can introduce the name of the groups to share it with and also get its local link.

note.title: Note
note.para: Remember, you can check the files or folders shared with you, shared with others or shared by link in the options you can find in the Files Options Menu.

section.title: Renaming files and see details
section.para: You can rename your folders and files at anytime and check the history of the item and other detais as related tags or sharings.
Find Details and Rename options in the dropdown menu beside the folders.

section.title: Delete files and folders
section.para: For deleting files you have two options:

listitem.para: Select the item you want to delete and then click on the vertical bar with three little circles that is located on the right of each file/ foldername. It opens a dropdown menu: select the Delete option.
Make a single or a multiple selection clicking the checkbox and select the Delete option that is displayed in the Navigation Menu.

note.title: Note
note.para: You can view all deleted files simply by clicking Deleted files option in the Application Settings Menu.
This screen shows you all files that were deleted and gives you the option of recovering them.

section.title: How can I change my password?
section.para: In the Users Settings Menu you can find the following options: Personal and Users.
Personal allows you to change your personal password and set your application password.
Users option enables you to set the Users Groups privileges and also create and change their users and passwords.

section.title: Checking if my version is updated
section.para: You can check if you currently have the latest stable version of ownCloud in Users Settings-> Administration.
In this section you access to several options for configuring your preferences.
